title: Enterprise Architecture
text: Aligning people, process, information and technology to enable an agile enterprise.
points: Information Management, Business Intelligence and Analytics

title: App/Solution Architecture
text: Simplifying complex business processes and technology to create a better vision and roadmap to the future.

title: Data Architecture
text: Capturing and transforming data as the foundation for data driven decision making and next-generation customer experience.
points: Data Governance, Data Quality and Master Data Management

title: Integration Architecture
text: Managing the impact of technology change through reduced dependencies and complexity.

title: Agile Program Delivery
text: Leading pragmatically using proven approaches and best practices to successfully set up and deliver strategic business capabilities.

title: Program and Architecture Assessment
text: Utilizing experiences, industry best practices and patterns as a guide for formulating recommendation to meeting desired goal.
